entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: NNE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
